stories.title: Shopping Cart Management
stories.description: As a customer, I want to manage items in my shopping cart so that I can review my selections before checkout

acceptance_criteria.given: I have items in my cart
acceptance_criteria.then: I see all items with prices and quantities

acceptance_criteria.given: I have an item in my cart
I have an item in my cart
acceptance_criteria.then: The item is removed and cart updates

stories.sp_justification: Basic CRUD operations with real-time updates

stories.title: Credit Card Payment Processing
stories.description: As a customer, I want to pay with credit card so that I can complete my purchase securely

acceptance_criteria.given: I am at checkout with items in cart
acceptance_criteria.then: I see a secure payment form with required fields

acceptance_criteria.given: I enter invalid credit card information
acceptance_criteria.then: I see clear error messages indicating what to fix

acceptance_criteria.given: I enter valid credit card information
acceptance_criteria.then: The payment processes and I see order confirmation

stories.sp_justification: Integration with payment gateway, security requirements, error handling

stories.title: Order Confirmation and Email
stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive order confirmation so that I have proof of purchase and details

acceptance_criteria.then: I see an order confirmation page with order details
I receive a confirmation email with order summary

stories.sp_justification: Simple email integration and confirmation page
